name: Word Search 8 Online Trivia | Word Play | 25 Questions

questions.text: Tangerines may cause a feeling of great annoyance?
questions.explanation:
Anger & anger.

	tANGERines. Anger is a feeling of great annoyance.

questions.text: This French composer can be found at the traveller's rest?
questions.explanation:
Ravel & ravel.

	tRAVELler's. (Maurice) Ravel was the French composer.

questions.text: Who knows the destination of Miss Turner, the American female vocalist?
questions.explanation:
Tina & tina.

	desTINAtion. Tina Turner is the American female vocalist.

questions.text: Does Johnny Mnemonic find the captain of the 'Nautilus' in '20,000 Leagues under the Sea'?
questions.explanation:
Nemo & nemo.

	mNEMOnic. Nemo was the captain of the 'Nautilus' in '20,000 Leagues under the Sea'.

questions.text: Can Vanessa Feltz provide protection from harm and security from risk?
questions.explanation:
Safe & safe.

	vanesSA FEltz. Safe is protection from harm or secure from risk.

questions.text: This Roman Emperor could be laborious, oppressive and onerous?
questions.explanation:
Nero & nero.

	oNEROus. Nero is the Roman Emperor.

questions.text: In folklore, a female giant who usually eats human flesh, has today made many advancements and progression?
questions.explanation:
Ogress & ogress.

	prOGRESSion. Ogress is the female giant who usually eats flesh in folklore.

questions.text: One really needs to make an appointment to see the doctor for a fatty or oily medicated preparation applied to the skin to heal or protect?
questions.explanation:
Ointment & ointment.

	appOINTMENT. Ointment is a fatty or oily medicated preparation applied to the skin to heal or protect.

questions.text: Does this river of central Europe flow through the German city of Heidelberg?
questions.explanation:
Elbe & elbe.

	heidELBErg. Elbe is the river in central Europe which flows to the North Sea at Hamburg.

questions.text: This west African landlocked republic is the home of Timbuktu and is found in Somalia?
questions.explanation:
Mali & mali.

	soMALIa. Mali is the west African landlocked republic in which the town of Timbuktu is located.

questions.text: Corvine birds such as the jay, magpie and nutcracker have appeared in the film 'The Thomas Crown Affair'?
questions.explanation:
Crow & crow.

	CROWn. Corvine birds such as the jay, magpie and nutcracker all belong to the crow family.

questions.text: Did George Michael really belong to this U.K. male vocal duo from New Hampshire?
questions.explanation:
Wham & wham.

	neW HAMpshire. George Michael belonged to this UK male vocal duo called 'Wham!' with Andrew Ridgeley. 'Freedom', 'Club Tropicana', 'Last Christmas' .... ZZZzzzz. ('Wake Me Up Before You Go Go')

questions.text: Before 1963 the capital city of Kuala Lumpur was found in the Himalayas?
questions.explanation:
Malaya & malaya.

	hiMALAYAs. In 1957 the Federation of Malaya became independent and in 1963 Singapore, Sabah and Sarawak joined the Federation which became known as Malaysia.

questions.text: Being the only one is obsolete?
questions.explanation:
Sole & sole.

	obSOLEte. Sole is being the only one.

questions.text: Let us streamline five hundred sheets of paper?
questions.explanation:
Ream & ream.

	stREAMline. A ream is 500 sheets of paper.

questions.text: Dorothy provided the glamour in the film 'Road to Bali'?
questions.explanation:
Lamour & lamour.

	gLAMOUR. Dorothy Lamour starred in the film 'Road to Bali'

questions.text: Are the 'Chamber of Horrors' a somewhat orange colour?
questions.explanation:
Amber & amber.

	chAMBER. Amber is a somewhat orange colour. Is it a colour between red and green? (think traffic lights).

questions.text: We found the competition was of little or lesser importance, even small?
questions.explanation:
Petit & petit.

	comPETITion. Petit is of little or lesser importance or another word for small.

questions.text: In the New Testament, another name for Matthew could be found by watching the television?
questions.explanation:
Levi & levi.

	teLEVIsion. In the New Testament, Levi is another name for Matthew.

questions.text: This Roman poet is seen at Providence, the capital of Rhode Island?
questions.explanation:
Ovid & ovid.

	prOVIDence. Ovid is the Roman poet.

questions.text: Was the personal occupation of Inspector Lestrade, a craft requiring skill?
questions.explanation:
Trade & trade.

	lesTRADE. A trade is a personal occupation especially a craft requiring skill.

questions.text: Land capable of being tilled for the production of crops causes unbearable pain?
questions.explanation:
Arable & arable.

	unbeARABLE. Arable is land capable of being tilled for the production of crops.

questions.text: The comedian specializes in jokes and comic skits, statistically directed towards the middle value in frequency distribution?
questions.explanation:
Median & median.

	coMEDIAN. The median is the middle value in frequency distribution. For example: 1,2,3,4,5. The median (middle one) is three.

questions.text: Female sheep are used to find the capital of the Republic of Maldives?
questions.explanation:
Male & male.

	feMALE. Male is the capital of the Republic of the Maldives.

questions.text: Any of the sharp terminal branches of a deer's antler are found in the continent of North America?
questions.explanation:
Tine & tine.

	conTINEnt. Tine is any of the sharp terminal branches of a deer's antler. Hope you enjoyed the quiz. If you find any alternative answers please let me know. Cheers, Quizzical
